scripts.deploy-local: source .env.production . && npm i && npm run clean && npm run build && npm run deploy-configure && npm run deploy-cache && npm run deploy-wout-cache && npm run deploy-invalidate
scripts.deploy-configure: source .env.production_deploy . && aws configure set aws_access_key_id $AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID --profile frontendProdProfile && aws configure set aws_secret_access_key $AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY --profile frontendProdProfile
scripts.deploy-cache: source .env.production_deploy . && aws s3 sync dist/ "s3://${S3_BUCKET}/" --cache-control max-age=31536000 --region us-east-1 --exclude='index.html' --profile frontendProdProfile
scripts.deploy-wout-cache: source .env.production_deploy . && aws s3 sync dist/ "s3://${S3_BUCKET}/" --cache-control no-cache --region us-east-1 --exclude='*' --include='index.html' --profile frontendProdProfile
scripts.deploy-invalidate: source .env.production_deploy . && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id $DISTRIBUTION_ID --paths "/*" --region us-east-1 --profile frontendProdProfile
